## ğŸ—ï¸ Architecture Documentation

### Package Structure
```
praisonaippt/
â”œâ”€â”€ __init__.py       # Public API
â”œâ”€â”€ core.py          # Presentation creation
â”œâ”€â”€ utils.py         # Utility functions
â”œâ”€â”€ loader.py        # JSON loading
â””â”€â”€ cli.py           # Command-line interface
```

### Key Design Decisions
- Modular code separation for maintainability
- Both CLI and Python API supported
- Built-in examples for easy start
- Text highlighting with minimal configuration

## ğŸ”§ Development Notes

### Font Sizes
- Verse Text: 32pt
- Reference Text: 22pt
- Section Titles: 44pt

### Highlight Formatting
- Bold text
- Orange color (RGB: 255, 140, 0)
- Case-insensitive matching
